entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who feels responsible for Griphook's presence at Shell Cottage. He is the one who insisted on keeping Griphook there to question him.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who ate grudgingly with the rest of them and had special dietary requests. He was kept at Shell Cottage by Harry's insistence.

entities.name: lestranges
entities.description: The Lestranges are a family whose vault is being targeted by Harry and his friends. They seem to be the target of their quest.

relationships.description: Harry feels responsible for Griphook's presence at Shell Cottage and his special dietary needs.
Harry and his friends are targeting the Lestranges' vault as part of their quest.
